stable.body:
• Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
• New map list with searching and sorting options
• Show thumbnail of chosen map
• Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
• Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
• More UI improvements
• Some bug fixes
stable.bodyMarkdown:
## Features
- add notice for September 2023 Files app updates [#30](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/30) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/5f247c0be8c527f49e02d221b9f41e241eac85a6))
- **maps-list**: remove quick actions [#28](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/28) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/f6881d2934710b7b8c78f85d2f48230a660d7c44))

## Bug Fixes
- **settings**: fix arrow rotation for RTL layout [#28](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/28) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/38c8524ff99e862b6de11d53b9c360c68efce701))
- use new auto mirrored icons [#28](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/28) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/c0325fd9bb2bedb4b868ca8f0da99e549b9a1e96))
- **update-sheet**: fix horizontal edge color [#28](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/28) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/5e847840d481f65385caeb3701b985c46bef9310))

## Documentation
- **README**: add warning about October 2023 security patches [skip ci] ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/0dc46bad63d12dee321938269aca0167cb8380a1))

## Chores
- update dependencies [#28](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/28) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/8118593044819fb3dbd6efb54dad5f03803fc35e))
- update app version to v1.5.1 (15100) [#28](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/28) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/df941d180352b8bede051647139eeb49a26ec107))
- merge `dev` branch into `main` [#28](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/28) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/964e00719af609bf4d82f9202da0c60bfb5bca86))

View this release on [GitHub](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/releases/tag/v1.5.1)

preRelease.body:
• Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
• New map list with searching and sorting options
• Show thumbnail of chosen map
• Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
• Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
• More UI improvements
• Some bug fixes
